title: Slow Cooker Roast Beef
directions: Pour soy sauce and dry onion soup mix into the slow cooker; mix well. Place chuck roast into the slow cooker. Add water until the top 1/2 inch of the roast is not covered. Sprinkle ground pepper on top.
Cover and cook on low for 22 hours.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
